Name: Geisha Mar-Tea-Knee
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of open tea pearl.
Review: Surprisingly fresh and light, this starts slightly sweet but finishes with refreshing bitter tannins. Tea pearls - hand-rolled balls of tea leaves -make a wonderful garnish.
Nutrition: One serving of Geisha Mar-Tea-Knee contains 153 calories
